DESCRIPTION: A resource used by cards and buildings.
Spend the shown amount of #yMaterial from your hand NL (unless specified otherwise). NL If you don't have enough, the effect does not happen.
An orb that consumes 1 #yMaterial from your hand to #yFire at the end of your turn.
A trap orb that self evokes at the end of your turn if enemy intends to attack
Makes #yTurrets deal their end of round damage without spending #yMaterial.
Refers to cards in Hand, Draw Pile and Discard Pile. NL In this order.
Unplayable unless the #yCharge is full. NL Each #yConsumed Material increases the #yCharge by 1. NL Playing the card spends the Charge. NL Charge stays between Combat
